translated: the bases, the factors that lead to downfalls, the factors that make one a spiritual practitioner, the supreme object of desire, the perfection of reality, the attainment of equality through ethical discipline,

original: tshul dang 'brel ba'i gzugs brnyan la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / dul bar gnas pa nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / dgos pa rjes su sgrub pa la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / ma brjod pa yang dag par blangs pa yongs su shes pa'i bsgrub par 'gyur ba nyid dang /
analyzed: tshul dang 'brel ba'i gzugs brnyan la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / dul bar gnas pa nyid la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / dgos pa rjes su sgrub pa la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / ma brjod pa yang dag par blangs pa yongs su shes pa'i bsgrub par 'gyur ba nyid dang /
translated: the attainment of the image that is connected with ethical discipline, the attainment of the state of being disciplined, the attainment of the accomplishment of the purpose, the attainment of the understanding of the implicit teaching,

original: gus pa la nges par sbyar pa /
analyzed: gus pa la nges par sbyar pa /
translated: the attainment of respect,

original: shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la //
analyzed: shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la //
translated: and the attainment of the teaching of supreme wisdom.

original: khyod ni bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod ni bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: You have attained full ordination.

original: dal dang 'byor pa rnyed dka' bas //
analyzed: dal dang 'byor pa rnyed dka' bas //
translated: The leisure and endowments are difficult to acquire.

original: 'di dag ji lta bzhin du bsgrubs //🔽mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang // yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par //
analyzed: 'di dag ji lta bzhin du bsgrubs // mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang // yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par //
translated: They should be practiced just as they are.🔽The Perfectly Awakened One knows🔽the ordination of the beautiful one,🔽the consecration of the pure one,

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te //
translated: and the full ordination.

original: bden pa'i mchan gyis bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bden pa'i mchan gyis bka' stsal to //
translated: He has spoken with the power of truth.

original: zhes bya ba dang / bsgrub par bya ba thabs brjod pa dang bcas pa la nges par sbyar ba byas te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / bsgrub par bya ba thabs brjod pa dang bcas pa la nges par sbyar ba byas te /
translated: The monks were engaged in practicing the methods for accomplishing the ritual.

original: dge slong de dag langs pa dang / khyim bdag de 'ongs te smras pa /
analyzed: dge slong de dag langs pa dang / khyim bdag de 'ongs te smras pa /
translated: When they got up, the householder came and said,

original: 'phags pa dag /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag /
translated: “Noble ones,

original: ci khyed cag spu gri thogs pa 'ba' zhig gis sdod dam /
analyzed: ci khyed cag spu gri thogs pa 'ba' zhig gis sdod dam /
translated: why do you just sit there holding razors?

original: gal te bdag la dad pa ma mchis par gyur du lags na /
analyzed: gal te bdag la dad pa ma mchis par gyur du lags na /
translated: If I were to lack faith,

original: 'di'i tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ro //🔽kye ma khyed kyis zhag bdun nam /
analyzed: 'di'i tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur ro // kye ma khyed kyis zhag bdun nam /
translated: it would be an obstacle to your pure conduct.”

original: brgyad cig bsrel na ci nongs zhes zer ba'i skabs de /
analyzed: brgyad cig bsrel na ci nongs zhes zer ba'i skabs de /
translated: “Oh, what’s wrong with spending seven or eight days?”

original: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One thought,🔽“What are the benefits of the full ordination?”

original: nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa pha mas ma gnang ba zhag bdun mi bsrel ba las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa pha mas ma gnang ba zhag bdun mi bsrel ba las gyur pa yin no snyam nas bka' stsal pa /
translated: Whatever problems arise are due to monks not waiting seven days for the parents of those who want to go forth to give their consent.”

original: de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa pha ma gson zhing @112a *//
analyzed: de lta bas na 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa pha ma gson zhing @112a *//
translated: “Therefore, if someone who wants to go forth comes to you,

original: de gnyis kyis ma gnang ba 'ongs na zhag bdun nam brgyad bsrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis ma gnang ba 'ongs na zhag bdun nam brgyad bsrel bar bya'o //
translated: and his parents are alive and have not given their consent, you should wait seven or eight days.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung 'dod pa 'ongs na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung 'dod pa 'ongs na /
translated: The Blessed One said, “If someone who wants to go forth comes to you,

original: zhag bdun nam brgyad bsrel bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhag bdun nam brgyad bsrel bar bya'o //
translated: you should wait seven or eight days.

original: zhes bka' stsal nas /
analyzed: zhes bka' stsal nas /
translated: ”🔽When those who want to go forth come to the monks with their parents’ consent,

original: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa pha mas gnang ba gzhan dag 'ongs shing yul thag ring ba pha mas gtam yang mi thos pa dag kyang 'ongs pa na /
analyzed: rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa pha mas gnang ba gzhan dag 'ongs shing yul thag ring ba pha mas gtam yang mi thos pa dag kyang 'ongs pa na /
translated: and others come from far away, where their parents cannot hear from them,

original: dge slong rnams kyis de dag kyang zhag bdun nam brgyad bsrel bar byed pas /
analyzed: dge slong rnams kyis de dag kyang zhag bdun nam brgyad bsrel bar byed pas /
translated: the monks wait seven or eight days for them.

original: de dag rab tu 'byung ba ma thob par dong ste /
analyzed: de dag rab tu 'byung ba ma thob par dong ste /
translated: Those who do not obtain going forth leave.

original: de nyid tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: de nyid tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de /
translated: The venerable ones said, “This is an obstacle to our going forth and full ordination in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya.”

original: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The monks asked the Blessed One about it, and the Blessed One said,

original: pha mas gnang ba gang dag 'ongs pa dang yul thag ring po pa mas gtam yang mi thos pa gang dag 'ongs pa de dag ni rab tu dbyung bar bya ste /
analyzed: pha mas gnang ba gang dag 'ongs pa dang yul thag ring po pa mas gtam yang mi thos pa gang dag 'ongs pa de dag ni rab tu dbyung bar bya ste /
translated: “Those who have come with their parents’ permission and those who have come from far away, where their parents cannot hear from them, should be given the going forth.

original: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o //
translated: There is no need to worry about this.”

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
translated: The Blessed Buddha was staying at Jetavana, Anāthapiṇḍada’s Park near Śrāvastī,

original: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des /🔽rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
analyzed: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des / rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
translated: when a certain householder in Śrāvastī🔽took a wife of equal caste

original: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /🔽dga' bar byed /
analyzed: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /🔽dga' bar byed /
translated: and they enjoyed themselves and coupled.

original: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //🔽rtse bar byed /🔽dga' bar byed /
analyzed: dga' mgur spyod par byed do // rtse bar byed / dga' bar byed /
translated: He took a wife of the same caste as himself, and they enjoyed themselves, took their pleasure, and made love.

original: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas /🔽des chung ma la smras pa /
analyzed: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i bu byung nas / des chung ma la smras pa /
translated: They played, took their pleasure, and made love, and a son was born.

original: bzang po yu bu cag gi bu @112b lon 'jal bar byed pa dang / nor spyod pa skyes kyis /
analyzed: bzang po yu bu cag gi bu @112b lon 'jal bar byed pa dang / nor spyod pa skyes kyis /
translated: He said to his wife, “My dear, a son has been born to us who will repay the gifts we have received, and who will enjoy our wealth.

original: kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o //
analyzed: kho bo zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o //
translated: I will take my goods and go to another country.”

original: rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig /
analyzed: rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig /
translated: “Do as you wish, my lord.”

original: de zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba dang / de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
analyzed: de zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba dang / de nyid du tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
translated: He took his goods and went to another country, and there he met with misfortune.

original: mas khye'u de nye du'i mthu dang lag mthus bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed nas /🔽des khye'u de yig dpon la bcol ba dang / khye'u de'i na zla rnams kyis ni yig 'bru'i yi ge dag lobs nas /
analyzed: mas khye'u de nye du'i mthu dang lag mthus bsnyod cing gsos te bskyed nas / des khye'u de yig dpon la bcol ba dang / khye'u de'i na zla rnams kyis ni yig 'bru'i yi ge dag lobs nas /
translated: His mother raised the boy with the help of relatives and friends.

original: phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag bklag par brtsams te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag bklag par brtsams te /
translated: She sent him to a teacher to learn to read and write, and the other boys learned the alphabet and the writing of letters,🔽but he did not learn.

original: de ni yig 'bru'i yi ge de dag nyid la slob par byed pa dang / de'i ma yig dpon gyi gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa /
analyzed: de ni yig 'bru'i yi ge de dag nyid la slob par byed pa dang / de'i ma yig dpon gyi gan du song ste phyin nas smras pa /
translated: He went to the teacher of writing and said,

original: jo bo khye'u 'di'i na zla khye'u dag gis khyod la ci 'bul ba de bdag kyang khyod la 'bul /
analyzed: jo bo khye'u 'di'i na zla khye'u dag gis khyod la ci 'bul ba de bdag kyang khyod la 'bul /
translated: “Sir, I will give you the same fee that the other boys give you for teaching them.

original: khye'u 'di'i na zla khye'u dag gis ni yi ge'i yig 'bru dag lobs nas phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag bklag par brtsams na /
analyzed: khye'u 'di'i na zla khye'u dag gis ni yi ge'i yig 'bru dag lobs nas phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag bklag par brtsams na /
translated: The other boys, when they have learned the letters of the alphabet, begin to read the treatises of the outsiders.

original: khye'u 'di'i ni da dung yi ge 'bru'i yi ge dag slob par bgyid do //
analyzed: khye'u 'di'i ni da dung yi ge 'bru'i yi ge dag slob par bgyid do //
translated: But this boy is still learning the letters of the alphabet.”

original: des smras pa /
analyzed: des smras pa /
translated: The teacher said,

original: rgyu gnyis kyis rig pa lobs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu gnyis kyis rig pa lobs par 'gyur te /
translated: “There are two causes of learning:

original: gang la bdag nyid las byung ba'i ngo tsha shes pa yod pa dang / gang la phyi rol las byung ba'i khrel yod pa yod pas so //
analyzed: gang la bdag nyid las byung ba'i ngo tsha shes pa yod pa dang / gang la phyi rol las byung ba'i khrel yod pa yod pas so //
translated: shame at one’s own lack of knowledge and embarrassment in the presence of others.

original: khye'u 'di la ni ngo tsha shes pa yang med la khrel yod pa yang med do //
analyzed: khye'u 'di la ni ngo tsha shes pa yang med la khrel yod pa yang med do //
translated: This boy has neither shame nor embarrassment.

original: 'di ltar khyod la yang nyes pa yod de /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyod la yang nyes pa yod de /
translated: But you also have a fault.

original: kho bos 'di bzhus pa na /
analyzed: kho bos 'di bzhus pa na /
translated: When I was reading,

original: khyed kyis shed bskyed do //🔽des smras pa /
analyzed: khyed kyis shed bskyed do // des smras pa /
translated: you were making a fuss.

original: de de bzhin no //
analyzed: de de bzhin no //
translated: He said, That's right.

original: bdag la nongs pa de mchis te /
analyzed: bdag la nongs pa de mchis te /
translated: I was at fault.

original: khyod kyis bzhus pa na bdag gis shed bskyed do //
analyzed: khyod kyis bzhus pa na bdag gis shed bskyed do //
translated: When you were reading, I was making a fuss.

original: dus gzhan zhig na des de bzhus pa dang / de du zhing ma'i gan du song ngo //🔽mas de la smras pa /
analyzed: dus gzhan zhig na des de bzhus pa dang / de du zhing ma'i gan du song ngo // mas de la smras pa /
translated: On another occasion, when his mother was reading, he cried and went to his mother.

original: @113a *// bu khyod ci'i phyir du /
analyzed: @113a *// bu khyod ci'i phyir du /
translated: His mother said to him, Son, why are you crying?

original: ma bdag yig dpon gyis bzhus so //🔽mas kyang de bzhus ba dang / khye'u des bsams pa /
analyzed: ma bdag yig dpon gyis bzhus so // mas kyang de bzhus ba dang / khye'u des bsams pa /
translated: He said, Mother, the teacher was reading.

original: gnyi gar nyes dmigs byung ste /
analyzed: gnyi gar nyes dmigs byung ste /
translated: When his mother was reading, the boy thought, Both of them have faults.

original: sngon ni bdag gnas gcig tu bzhus na /
analyzed: sngon ni bdag gnas gcig tu bzhus na /
translated: Previously, when I was read to in one place,

original: da ni gnas gnyi gar bzhus pas /
analyzed: da ni gnas gnyi gar bzhus pas /
translated: now I am read to in two places.

original: bdag gis gnas gnyi gar gnod pa mi bzod pas 'bros so snyam nas /
analyzed: bdag gis gnas gnyi gar gnod pa mi bzod pas 'bros so snyam nas /
translated: Since I cannot bear the harm in both places, I will run away.

original: de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / de na dge tshul zhig me tog thu ba de des mthong nas /🔽khye'u des smras pa /
analyzed: de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / de na dge tshul zhig me tog thu ba de des mthong nas / khye'u des smras pa /
translated: He went to the Jetavana, where he saw a novice picking flowers.

original: 'phags pa khyod re bde /
analyzed: 'phags pa khyod re bde /
translated: The boy said, Noble one, are you well?

original: de ci'i phyir /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang gi phyir khyod rab tu byung bas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyod rab tu byung bas so //
translated: “Because you are a renunciant.”

original: khyod ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
analyzed: khyod ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
translated: “Why don’t you go forth?”

original: 'phags pa bdag sus rab tu 'byin par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'phags pa bdag sus rab tu 'byin par 'gyur /
translated: “Noble one, who will give me the going forth?”

original: des smras pa /🔽tshur shog mkhan po'i gan du 'dong zhes des de khrid de /
analyzed: des smras pa / tshur shog mkhan po'i gan du 'dong zhes des de khrid de /
translated: He said,🔽“Come, let us go to the preceptor.”

original: mkhan po'i gan du song nas smras pa /
analyzed: mkhan po'i gan du song nas smras pa /
translated: He took him to the preceptor and said,

original: mkhan po rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis /🔽'di rab tu dbyung du gsol /
analyzed: mkhan po rigs kyi bu 'di rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis / 'di rab tu dbyung du gsol /
translated: “Preceptor, this son of noble family wishes to go forth.🔽Please give him the going forth.”

original: des de rab tu phyung ngo //
analyzed: des de rab tu phyung ngo //
translated: He gave him the going forth.

original: de'i ma yig dpon gyi gan du song ste smras pa /
analyzed: de'i ma yig dpon gyi gan du song ste smras pa /
translated: His mother went to the scribe and said,

original: khye'u de da gar mchis /
analyzed: khye'u de da gar mchis /
translated: “Where is my son?”

original: de de ring kho bos bzhus so //
analyzed: de de ring kho bos bzhus so //
translated: “I took him today.”

original: des kyang smras pa /
analyzed: des kyang smras pa /
translated: He said,

original: bdag gis kyang de de ring bzhus so //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang de de ring bzhus so //
translated: “I took him today, too.”

original: yig dpon gyis smras pa /
analyzed: yig dpon gyis smras pa /
translated: The scribe said,

original: de bros kyis tshol du song zhig /
analyzed: de bros kyis tshol du song zhig /
translated: “Go and look for him. He has run away.”

original: des dka' thub kyi tshal dang / mu stegs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu bu 'dri zhing song ste dris na /
analyzed: des dka' thub kyi tshal dang / mu stegs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu bu 'dri zhing song ste dris na /
translated: He went to look for his son in the hermitages and the abodes of the tīrthikas, but

original: de'i gtam thos pa yang su yang med do //
analyzed: de'i gtam thos pa yang su yang med do //
translated: no one had seen him.

original: de mnyan yod du song ste sgor bsdad pa dang / dge tshul de yang snga dro sham thabs bgos /
analyzed: de mnyan yod du song ste sgor bsdad pa dang / dge tshul de yang snga dro sham thabs bgos /
translated: He went to Śrāvastī and sat at the door.

original: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
analyzed: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
translated: The novice monk put on his lower garment and Dharma robes,🔽took his alms bowl, and went to Śrāvastī for alms with his novice attendant.

original: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge tshul de nyid dang mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / @113b des de mthong nas /
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dge tshul de nyid dang mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / @113b des de mthong nas /
translated: When she saw him,

original: des brang brdungs te smras pa /
analyzed: des brang brdungs te smras pa /
translated: she beat her breast and said,🔽“Son, I have not sought you in the hermitages and the abodes of the tīrthikas.

original: bu dka' thub kyi tshal dang mu stegs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu kho mos khyod kyi phyir ma btsal ba de dag gang yod de khyod kyi gtam thos pa yang su yang med na /
analyzed: bu dka' thub kyi tshal dang mu stegs kyi gnas de dang de dag tu kho mos khyod kyi phyir ma btsal ba de dag gang yod de khyod kyi gtam thos pa yang su yang med na /
translated: No one has heard any news of you.

original: khyod sh'akya'i bu'i rkun ma rnams kyi nang du ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung tshur shog 'dong zhes des de'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas khyim du khrid do //
analyzed: khyod sh'akya'i bu'i rkun ma rnams kyi nang du ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung tshur shog 'dong zhes des de'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas khyim du khrid do //
translated: Why did you go forth among the Śākya’s criminal sons? Come here!” She took him by the hand and led him to her house.

original: de nyid tshe dang ldan pa de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de /
analyzed: de nyid tshe dang ldan pa de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de /
translated: The venerable one’s going forth and full ordination in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya were interrupted.🔽The monks asked the Blessed One about it,

original: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba /🔽nye dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba / nye dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni /
translated: and the Blessed One thought,

original: dge slong dag dge 'dun la ma zhus par rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas /
analyzed: dge slong dag dge 'dun la ma zhus par rab tu 'byin pa las gyur pa yin no snyam nas /
translated: “Whatever problems arise are due to monks giving the going-forth rite without the approval of the saṅgha.”

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: He decreed,

original: de lta bas na dge slong gis dge 'dun la ma zhus par rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na dge slong gis dge 'dun la ma zhus par rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o //
translated: “Therefore, monks should not give the going-forth rite without the approval of the saṅgha.

original: 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'od na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gi gan du rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa 'od na /
translated: If someone wishes to go forth in the presence of a monk,

original: des de dge 'dun la zhur gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: des de dge 'dun la zhur gzhug par bya'o //
translated: that monk should have him request the saṅgha.

original: ma zhus par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma zhus par rab tu 'byin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
